extensionDescription.message: Adds new features to favorite players, such as track info notifications, controls outside of browser window, and recent tracks list.

notificationFavoriteStatusSuccess.message: Thank you for rewarding a DJ's hard work!

notificationButtonsVolumeUpTitle.description: Out of 3 possible variants (volume, sound volume, sound volume level), please use 'sound volume'.

notificationButtonsVolumeDownTitle.description: Out of 3 possible variants (volume, sound volume, sound volume level), please use 'sound volume'.

notificationButtonsVolumeChangeFeedback.description: Sound volume level after a change. Out of 3 possible variants (volume, sound volume, sound volume level), please use 'sound volume'.

kbps.description: Kilobit per second. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_rate_units#Kilobit_per_second for more information.

systemNotificationUpdatedDoNotNotify.message: Do not notify me of updates

showPlayerEventNotification.description: Show notification on playback start/stop, on sound volume change, on track added to playlist, on track favorited event, on track switch, and so on.

showPlayerEventNotificationLong.message:
Show notification on playback start/stop/resume, on sound volume change, on track added to playlist, on track favorited event, on track switch, and so on.

If unchecked, you can still make the notification show up by calling “Show notification” command with the help of keyboard shortcuts (Alt+Shift+Q if unchanged).

showSuccessfulUpdateNotification.message: Show when PoziTone is successfully updated

displayKeyboardShortcutsTips.message: Display keyboard shortcuts tips next to commands

optionsSettingsSoundVolumeControl.description: Out of 3 possible variants (volume, sound volume, sound volume level), please use 'sound volume'.

optionsSettingsSoundVolumeControlUseDefa.description: Words inside <a /> tag should be the ones from 'module_general' and 'optionsNavSettings' ('General' and 'Settings' => 'general settings').

optionsSettingsSoundVolumeControlDelta.description: Used for a field asking to enter an integer value of percentage (1-99) which will be used when increasing or decreasing sound volume.

optionsSettingsGeneralUeipDesc.message: UEIP collects information about how our users use PoziTone and about some of the problems they encounter. The developers team of PoziTone — PoziWorld — uses this information to improve the product and features users use most often and to help solve problems. Participation in the program is voluntary, and the end results are software improvements to better meet the needs of our users.

optionsSettingsGeneralUeipMore.message: Tell me more about the program

optionsSettingsDisplayWhenMuted.message: When volume is at 0% or sound off

optionsSettingsDisplayWhenNoTrackInfo.message: When there is no information about what is currently being played (shown as "..." on website)

optionsSettingsAdditionalInfoShowCbr.description: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constant_bitrate — if Wikipedia has an article in this language, please include a link. Otherwise remove <a /> from the translation.

optionsSettingsNotificationTitleFormatLo.message: Display current station name + short description (if available)

optionsSettingsNotificationTitleFormatNo.message: Don't display information about current station

optionsSettingsNotificationButtons.message: Available buttons <small>(maximum 2 can be displayed at one time)</small>

optionsSettingsNotificationButtonsAddAut.message: Add track to playlist <small>(authorization required on site)</small>

optionsSettingsNotificationButtonsFavori.message: I like it! <small>(authorization required on site)</small>

projectsDescriptionParagraph1.message: PoziTone is being developed by a small team called PoziWorld.

projectsDescriptionParagraph2.message: PoziWorld develops web browser extensions that help you solve everyday tasks easier, faster, more efficiently, are free to use, and do not track your activity without your prior agreement.

sttbDescriptionParagraph1.message: Adds a scroll to top and/or bottom button.

sttbDescriptionParagraph2.message: Great for viewing long/infinite pages such as Facebook, Twitter, etc.

pwmDescriptionParagraph1.message: Helps you minimize print waste, save ink.

pwmDescriptionParagraph2.message: Go Green on the following Print Return Label pages: Amazon, eBay, and Old Navy.

spreadTheWordWhyNot.message: If you find PoziTone useful, why not recommend it to your friends, colleagues, and/or followers?

spreadTheWordWays.message: There are a few ways you can help our cause:

spreadTheWordFollowUs.message: Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, VK, Odnoklassniki, and Instagram.

spreadTheWordInstallationLink.message: Share the installation link on your social networks and/or blog.

spreadTheWordRateLink.message: Rate PoziTone – the feedback really helps others find this extension!

rateExtension.message: Please rate PoziTone – the feedback really helps others find this extension!

feedbackIdeas.message: Please share your ideas.

feedbackQuestions.message: Don't be shy to ask questions.

feedbackIssues.message: Bug reports are valuable!

feedbackPraises.message: We like praises, who doesn't? :)

feedbackIncentives.message: Stick is helpful, but carrot is sweeter. ;)

translationParagraph1.message: Sprechen Sie Deutsch? Vous parlez français?

translationParagraph2.message: We want as many PoziTone users as possible to be able to interact with the extension in their native language.

translationParagraph3.message: If you know any foreign language or just noticed a discrepancy in the translation, please let us know.

incentiveParagraph.message: If you appreciate the work we have done, please consider stimulating PoziTone development via PayPal, Square Cash, or Coinbase.

versionHistoryHref.description: Please check whether there is a version of https://github.com/PoziWorld/PoziTone/blob/develop/HISTORY_en.md for your language.

optionsFoundation.message: PoziTone is made possible by love and kindness.

optionsHelpText.message: By submitting the information listed below, you will let the developers of PoziTone find a solution to a problem, you may be experiencing, quicker.

popupNavRecentTracksPlaceholder.message:
Looking for some tunes?
How about some punk-rock with elements of hardcore?
Or hip-hop?

modulesBuiltInDescription.message: Add new features to your favorite online media players by enabling appropriate PoziTone modules.

trademarksDisclaimer.message: All trademarks mentioned belong to their owners, third party brands, product names, trade names, corporate names and company names mentioned may be trademarks of their respective owners or registered trademarks of other companies and are used for purposes of explanation and to the owner's benefit, without implying a violation of copyright law.

trademarksDisclaimerContinued.message: All information and content (texts, graphics and images) are reported to the best of our knowledge, public knowledge, if unintentionally, has been published or copyrighted material in violation of the law, please inform us and we will immediately remove it.

generalPrivacyStatement.message: PoziTone does not read, change, store, or transmit any of your personal data (e.g., logins, passwords, messages, contacts) from any of the sites or your computer in absolutely any form.

privacyStatementForOrigins.message: “Read and change your data”: this permission is required for the correct operation of PoziTone with a player (controlling playback, adjusting sound volume, getting current track name and performer).

privacyStatementForTabs.message: “Read your browsing history”: this permission is required for getting a current URL of the page on the basis of which PoziTone checks whether to load a corresponding module.

apiErrorTypeofMismatch.description: When the following JavaScript snippet equals true: typeof strCall !== 'string'

apiErrorMethodNotSupported.description: When method is valid but not supported by this call or not valid (for example, there is a typo)

apiErrorMissingRequiredParameter.description: Missing a parameter required for correct operation

apiConnectModuleHadBeenConnected.message: Module had already been connected to PoziTone
